5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abdullah (b. Mas'ud) reported:The Apostle of Allah (ﷺ) said five rak'ahs of the noon prayer and when he completed the prayer, It was said to him: Has there been (commanded) an addition In prayer? He said: What is it? They said: You have said five rak'ahs, so he performed two prostrations

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّهْوِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَالسُّجُودِ لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: As-Sahw (forgetfulness) in prayer and prostrating to compensate for it
